MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL29 postcode area of Colwyn Bay, affecting properties in Abergele Road, Station Road and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of  an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.46PM on 9th November 2020
